java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchEngineClient
public class WikipediaClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchEngineClient

A search engine client for Wikipedia Search (part of the Wikipedia API).

Author:
Tan Yee Fan

Constructor Detail

WikipediaClient

public WikipediaClient()
Constructor.

The client will query from English Wikipedia.

WikipediaClient

public WikipediaClient(java.lang.String host)
Constructor.

Parameters:
host - Either the language of the Wikipedia server (e.g., "en"), or the hostname of the server hosting a MediaWiki installation (e.g., "www.mediawiki.org").

WikipediaClient

public WikipediaClient(java.lang.String host,
                       int port)
Constructor.

Parameters:
host - Hostname of the server hosting a MediaWiki installation (e.g., "www.mediawiki.org").
port - Port of the server.
Method Detail

getResults

public SearchEngineResults getResults(SearchEngineQuery query)
                               throws SearchEngineException
Makes a query to the search engine and returns its results.

Specified by:
getResults in interface SearchEngineClient
Parameters:
query - The search engine query.
Throws:
SearchEngineFatalException - If a fatal error occurred during the querying.
SearchEngineQuotaException - If the quota for the (rate-limited) allowable number of queries has been exceeded.
SearchEngineException - If any other error occurred during the querying.
